title: Bangladesh will return to darkness if AL doesn't remain in power: PM
news: Prime Minister and Awami League President Sheikh Hasina has said Bangladesh will plunge into an era of darkness if her party does not remain in power.

title: Amusement parks turn over Tk 5,000cr annually
news: Investment in Bangladesh's amusement and theme park segment is on the rise as investors are pumping money into the fast-expanding industry to serve visitors, according to industry people.
